words_with_descriptions.owl: A nocturnal bird known for its distinctive hoot and rotating head.
words_with_descriptions.walrus: A large marine mammal with distinctive tusks and whiskers.
words_with_descriptions.ram: A male sheep, also known for its role in the zodiac as Aries.
words_with_descriptions.otter: An aquatic mammal known for its playfulness and ability to use tools.
words_with_descriptions.goat: A hardy domesticated animal known for its climbing ability and diverse diet.
words_with_descriptions.ant: A tiny insect known for its strength and cooperative colonies.
words_with_descriptions.cat: A popular domesticated animal known for its independence and hunting skills.
words_with_descriptions.cricket: An insect known for its chirping sound.
words_with_descriptions.pigeon: A common city bird known for its navigational abilities.
words_with_descriptions.bobcat: A North American wild cat known for its short tail and tufted ears.
